DWF 3D Toolkit
[DWF Toolkit Components]

Collaboration diagram for DWF 3D Toolkit:

Detailed Description

This module is the streaming I/O layer for DWF 3D graphics. It is based in large part on the HOOPS Stream Toolkit from Tech Soft America. DWF 3D graphics streams (known as W3D resources) are virtually identical to HSF 10 data streams. DWF has extended the graphics format and introduced smart associations between the scene and the DWF. Moving forward, the format will continue to evolve to meet the specific needs of DWF and its customer base.
